name: Knockout City
overview: Calling all brawlers: join us in Knockout City™ today and check it out for FREE*! Team up and duke it out with rivals across every map, with every ball, in every style, through every playlist. Throw, catch, pass, dodge, and tackle your way to dodgeball dominance! Customize your character and to start your Knockout City takeover. Knock out opponents with trick shots and coordinated teamwork while dodging and catching balls flying across the map. No ball? No problem! You can literally ball up, roll into a teammate’s hands, and become the ultimate weapon! A variety of outlandish ball types, locations, and game modes keep it exciting. Plus, each season introduces new maps, ball types, rewards, events, and challenges—but you’ll need to purchase the game to experience that!
